  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
  Sent: Sunday, December 17, 2000 8:31 AM
  Subject: Re: Cross Fire


 =
 The first missle strikes a rock sending shrapnel into Ice. Her thick hide =
took most of the abuse but she did have cuts and scratches. the second hit =
in front of her feat forcing her back. dust and dirt temporarily impaired h=
er senses but her mental abilities warned her of the others intentions. Ice=
 transforms to Owl mode and launches herself skyward out of the way of the =
wave beam. She flew toward Razor Claw planning to use his shield to protect=
 her too. Horn Drills shots strike her before she can get to safety, she pl=
umets to the ground transforming to her sort of robot mode before hitting. =
She tried to control her pain but her emotions soon turned to fear. She tri=
ed to use her telekinetic powers to deflect the other blast but couldn't fi=
nd anything solid to grab hold of. the blast was ready to hit her when it s=
uddenly disipated. Ice opened her eyes and saw a ball of energy in front of=
 her, thinking it was another blast heading towards her she yells in terror=
 "Get away from me." the ball of negative ionic energy hurtled toward Grena=
de and Beholder2.

  Razor Claw saw Ice go down and rushed to her side. See=
ing she was alright he charged at Gigas head firs in a ramming attempt.
   =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
    Sent: Friday, December 15, 2000 8:17 PM
    Subject: Re: Cross Fire
=


    Kracken aimed at Ice.

    Kracken: Yo! That one will be good!

    K=
racken fires 2 missiles at Ice. Gigas fires his wave beams at Ice. Horn Dri=
ll fires at Ice, Grenade and Beholder 2 join their blasted together into on=
e, both of them holding the large gun, and fire it at Ice...
      ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

      Sent: Friday, December 15, 2000 5:16 AM
      Subject: Re: Cross Fir=
e


      Razor Claws knocked back after being caugh off gaurd by the first=
 missle. He hits the ground leaving a skid mark across the ground, He roare=
d with pain as shrapnel from other missles hit around him. He rolled back t=
o his feat creating his forcefield. As long as his feat remained planted th=
e shots wouldn't be able to penetrate. "Ice, Lunarpine, I've got them distr=
acted, any time you'd like to join the fun, I'm ready to Party." He shouts =
over his comm. He knew that his teamates had thier paws full no matter wher=
e they were.
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
 =
       To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, December 14, 2000 9:=
39 AM
        Subject: Re: Cross Fire


        The Mini-Mafia split back u=
p again. Kracken sees Razorclaw.

        Kracken: I won't ask. Hey! Look! =
Razorclaw! Good target, mob! Start with one, don't target another till he's=
 done!

        Kracken fires 2 missiles at Razorclaw. Horn Dril fires a dr=
ill missile, with the power of about 2 missiles because it's packed with ac=
idic material and explosives and just waiting to explode, and he fired this=
 single missile at Razorclaw. Gigas fires a bolt of electricity from his ha=
nd at Razorclaw. Grenade shoots a fireball at Razorclaw. Beholder 2 fires 3=
 beams, they travel in waves toward Razorclaw...
          ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
          From: Alloran2@... 
          To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
          Sent: Thursday, December 14, 2000 8:54 AM
          Subjec=
t: Re: Cross Fire


          OOC: No, 2 missles out of one missle luancher=
.  If you have two, than you can 
          2 from each of them.  Oh, sorry=
, didnt know what EMPs did. I'll take that 
          back. 

          :::=
Sharpedge/Godfather/Hellbat/Sharpedge/Treadshot/Torca/Starscream::: 

     =
     ::He dodges the missles but gets hit by a charge andthe optic blasts. =
 he 
          fires 2 missles at Hot Rod.  Godfather uses his jetpack to g=
o over all the 
          shots.  Staying in the air, he fired 15 shots fro=
m his pistol at Teltoli.  
          Hellbat gets knocked out from the EMP.=
  Hearing what FZ said, Sharpedge opens 
          up a comm to the Mafia::=
 
          Sharpedge: Mafia, do not for Mobster yet.  We must wait until t=
hey are 
          weakened! Zardus' orders. 
          ::Treadshot transfo=
rms to tank mode and lobbed 2 missles at Razor Claw. Torca 
          hears=
 Klant's words:: 
          Torca: Thats alright, well wait here till you A=
RE ready. 
          ------------------------------------------------------=
------------------------

          ---------------------------------------=
------ 
          ::Starscream maneuvers out of the way of the fire ball, f=
iring 25 shots from 
          each of his 2 guns at Megaton::
